collections.name: events
collections.description: Contains player activity events such as logins, question answers, item interactions, and zone visits.

collections.name: players
collections.description: Contains player information including IDs, names, and other profile details.

collections.name: items
collections.description: Contains information about game items that players can interact with.

collections.name: zones
collections.description: Contains information about game zones or areas that players can visit.

collections.name: questions
collections.description: Contains questions that players can answer, including choices and correct answers.

collections.name: leaderboards
collections.description: Contains player scores, levels, and rankings.
